bookings.title: Book a Free Consultation
bookings.subtitle: We help you choose the best solutions to grow your business

step1.title: What's your most exciting opportunity or biggest roadblock?
step1.description: Tell us about the most exciting opportunity or biggest roadblock in your business that tech could supercharge—like automating workflows or scaling with AI.

step2.title: What would you transform with a magic wand?
step2.description: If you could wave a magic wand and transform one aspect of your operations, what would it be and why?

step3.title: Timeline and investment range
step3.description: How soon are you looking to see results from this, and what's your rough investment range to make it happen?

step4.title: What would success look like?
step4.description: What would a game-changing win look like for you in the next 3-6 months, and how can we help make that a reality?
step4.label: Describe your ideal outcome (minimum 10 characters)
step4.placeholder: e.g., Increase efficiency by 40% through automation, or launch our mobile app to reach 10k users...

step5.title: Let's schedule a call
step5.message: Great! We're redirecting you to Calendly to schedule your call.
step5.fallback: If the page doesn't open automatically,

story.paragraph1: AlphaTrio Tech was founded with a mission to bridge the gap between cutting-edge technology and practical business solutions. We believe that technology should empower businesses, not complicate them.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we've helped dozens of companies transform their operations through innovative IT solutions, automation, and AI-powered systems. Our team is dedicated to delivering excellence in every project.
